Kulkor Battlearm Warrior [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Fighter, Kulkor Battlearm Student feat
Benefit: When you are attacking with an axe, a hammer, or a mace that has the versatile property and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
When you hit a creature with a martial encounter power, any ally gains a +2 feat bonus to AC while adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a melee basic attack when charging.


Associated Powers: Crumpling Slam, Crushing Blow, Mountain Breaking Blow, Skullcrusher, Stay Down

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 118.
